text_block_list.text: On the day of the 'Yasuda Kinen'. Matikanetannhauser gets pumped up for the race with Ikuno Dictus, while looking forward to the pudding she brought along.
Amidst this, Ikuno Dictus comes to greet her and points out that the pudding has passed its expiration date.
Touched by the kindness of her rival Ikuno Dictus, who says, 'It's good you didn't collapse before the race'... the 'Yasuda Kinen' begins!
